  • Method Details

    • hasAudio

      boolean hasAudio()
      Has audio support?
      Returns:
      true if stream codec has audio support, false otherwise

    • hasVideo

      boolean hasVideo()
      Has video support?
      Returns:
      true if stream codec has video support, false otherwise

    • getAudioCodecName

      String getAudioCodecName()
      Getter for audio codec name
      Returns:
      Audio codec name

    • getVideoCodecName

      String getVideoCodecName()
      Getter for video codec name
      Returns:
      Video codec name

    • getVideoCodec

      IVideoStreamCodec getVideoCodec()
      Return video codec
      Returns:
      Video codec used by stream codec

    • getAudioCodec

      IAudioStreamCodec getAudioCodec()
      Return audio codec
      Returns:
      Audio codec used by stream codec

    • setAudioCodec

      default void setAudioCodec(IAudioStreamCodec codec)
      Set audio codec.
      Parameters:
      codec - a IAudioStreamCodec object

    • setVideoCodec

      default void setVideoCodec(IVideoStreamCodec codec)
      Set video codec.
      Parameters:
      codec - a IVideoStreamCodec object
